subtitle: Predict next month's electricity bill with Machine Learning
usage_details_caption: Enter your electricity usage information below
current_unit_help: How many units of electricity did you use this month?
previous_unit_help: How many units did you use last month? If unsure, use the same value as current month.
people_count_help: How many people live in your household?
target_month_help: Which month do you want to predict?
is_break_help: During school breaks, electricity usage patterns typically change
validation_info: Prediction will continue, but results may be unreliable. Please verify your inputs.
break_note: School break periods (Zero/Low occupancy) typically lower the predicted bill.
footer: Created with Antigravity Agent | AIE322 Project
error_model_info: Please run the training script first
disclaimer: Disclaimer: Predictions are estimates. Actual bills may vary.
